thread.title: Rex Tillerson Says “All Options Are On The Table” With North Korea
thread.title_full: Rex Tillerson Says “All Options Are On The Table” With North Korea

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Rex Tillerson Says “All Options Are On The Table” With North Korea
text:
Rex Tillerson is the real deal. 
You can just tell that he isn’t really big on screwing around. 
He made some comments on North Korea recently that turned some heads.   
From Townhall : googletag.cmd.push(function()   
Secretary of State Rex Tillerson said the “policy of strategic patience” is over regarding North Korea’s pursuit of missile and nuclear weapons. As a result, U.S. military force is one option that’s on the table for dealing with the rogue nation.   
“We’re exploring a new range of diplomatic, security and economic measures,” Tillerson said in Seoul while speaking alongside South Korean Foreign Minister Yun Byung-se. “All options are on the table.” 
Big league. 
Liberals will freak out of course but they had it their way for 8 years and it was a disaster when it comes to foreign policy. 
Can you point to a single region on the globe that’s more stable than it was before Obama came around?
